name: International Association of Art (IAA) Europe
headAddress: c/o Internationale Gesellschaft der Bildenden Künste (IGBK)
membership:
International Association of Art (IAA), www.aiap-iaa.org
Culture Action Europe (CAE) (effective February 2018), www.cultureactioneurope.org
goal:
The International Association of Art (IAA) Europe is a network of about 40 national member organisations within Europe, representing professional visual artists.
It is one of the five cultural regions (Africa, Arab States, Asia and the Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, Europe) of the International Association of Art (IAA), the largest international non-governmental association of visual artists, with more than 100 member organisations worldwide. The IAA supports international cooperation and artistic exchange, free from any aesthetic, political or other bias and aims to improve the economic and social position of artists on national and international level.
interests: Culture, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Information Society, Taxation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
- EU-Regulations on the coordination of social security systems
- Public consultation on a possible EU action addressing the challenges of access to social protection for people in all forms of employment in the framework of the European Pillar of Social Rights
- The directive on the harmonization of certain aspects of copyright and related rights in the information society
